item.title: Exploring Bundestag speeches
item.description: tl;dr gganimate is great to visualize time-dependent data. E.g. Open Discourse, a well designed comprehensive, machine readable open-source corpus of the plenary proceedings of the federal German Parliament. Plotting Bundestag speeches The plot below shows the summed speeches of politicians in the german Bundestag by Year. The colors are indicating the party each politician belongs to. Honestly, this is mostly a quick proof of concept on publishing a website via Git commits, utilizing Hugo, R blogdown and Netlify.
